entities.name: refuge
entities.description: Harry's home where he is safe from his uncle

entities.name: aunt
entities.description: Harry's aunt who knows the pact and allows Harry to stay with her

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The one who sent the Howler to remind Harry's aunt of the pact

entities.name: howler
entities.description: A magical object that conveys a message from Dumbledore to Harry's aunt

entities.name: pact
entities.description: An agreement between Harry's aunt and Dumbledore to protect Harry

relationships.description: Dumbledore sent a Howler to remind Harry's aunt of the pact
The Howler conveyed Dumbledore's message to Harry's aunt
Dumbledore was a part of the pact with Harry's aunt
Harry's aunt was a part of the pact with Dumbledore
